Click "开始下载" to initiate the download of QQ Browser X86 Edition.
Input "冬天穿衣推荐" into the search bar.
Navigate back to the previous screen.
Open the application "QQ浏览器" to initiate browsing.
Click the title "QQ浏览器x86老版本上...", navigating to a page related to older versions of the QQ browser.
Navigate back to the previous screen.
Click the camera icon located at the top right of the screen.
